lyrics.text:
Ha’u ‘akimoutolu, ‘oku
Tui kia Sīsū;
Ke tau fakaongo atu,
‘Ene angalelei.

Ko hotau Fakamo’ui.
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Ke tau hiva fiefia,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.

‘Oku kei tatali ia,
Pea Tukituki;
Ki he loto kotoa pē,
‘O e angakovi.

‘Oua na’a teke’i ia,
‘E he angakovi;
Kae tō ‘a e matapā
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei.

’Oku mau fiefia fai,
Pea ‘amanaki;
Te ke hū ki loto, ‘Eiki,
Ke mau mo’ui ai.

Ko e ‘Eiki mei langi,
‘A e ‘Afiona;
Ke ke hā’ele vave mai,
Ke tau nonofo ma’u.

Pea ke tau ‘ohomohe,
‘E ‘Eiki, mo koe,
‘I he katoanga, ko e
‘Ofa ta’engata.
